title: Ripple rejects IPO plans despite SEC case victory: Here’s why
summary: Ripple won’t pursue an IPO after resolving its SEC case despite record growth, major new investors and rising industry momentum for public listings.

title: How TradFi banks are advancing new stablecoin models
summary: Stablecoins are shifting from crypto-native experiments to instruments embedded in existing banking and payment infrastructure.

title: Majority of traditional hedge funds now exposed to crypto assets: Survey
summary: AIMA says 55% of traditional hedge funds now hold crypto, with most planning to increase exposure as US regulation boosts confidence.

title: Crypto needs to rethink incentive structures before the mainstream arrives
summary: Tokenomics favor speed over conviction, using genuine supporters as exit liquidity. Crypto’s mainstream future requires replacing extraction with participation incentives.

title: Bybit hack: ‘Reckoning’ that led SafeWallet to rearchitect its systems
summary: Ethereum smart account wallet platform SafeWallet has rearchitected its systems in the wake of the infamous $1.5 billion theft of ETH from Bybit.

title: XRP price slips despite Ripple’s bullish Swell announcements: Is $2 next?
summary: XRP price charts confirm a bear flag breakdown as a death cross looms, signaling potential continuation of its downtrend toward key support levels near $1.65.

title: Zcash knocking at door of top 10 cryptos as market cap smashes $10.6B
summary: Zcash tops privacy coins with a $10.6 billion market cap, outperforming Monero amid renewed investor demand for onchain anonymity.

title: Japan’s FSA backs joint stablecoin initiative by nation’s top banks
summary: Japan’s financial regulator has launched a “Payment Innovation Project” backing a joint initiative by major banks and corporations to issue yen-based stablecoins.

title: Why this key Bitcoin price trendline at $100K is back in focus
summary: BlackRock and Fidelity led a rebound in spot Bitcoin ETFs inflows on Thursday, as traders shifted their focus to the 50-week EMA at about $100,000.

title: Bitcoin ETFs snap six-day outflow streak with $240M inflows
summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs saw $240 million in inflows after six days of redemptions, signaling renewed institutional demand for BTC.
